com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util

Class ReflectionUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.ReflectionUtil

  • public final class ReflectionUtil
extends Object
    This class provides helpers for invoking objects using the java.lang.reflect package to invoke objects.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Francis Naoum

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • invokeMethod

        public static Object invokeMethod(Object obj,
                  String methodName,
                  Object[] params,
                  Class[] paramTypes)
        Invoke the public method on the given object.
        Parameters:
        obj - is the Object to invoke
        methodName - is the name of the method to invoke
        params - are the param to pass to the method
        paramTypes - are the types of parameters to be passed.
        Returns:
        the result of the method call.

      • invokeStaticMethod

        public static Object invokeStaticMethod(Class cls,
                        String staticMethod,
                        Object[] params,
                        Class[] paramTypes)
        Invoke a public static method on the given class.
        Parameters:
        cls - is the class where the static method lives.
        staticMethod - is the name of the method to invoke
        params - are the param to pass to the method
        paramTypes - are the types of parameters to be passed.
        Returns:
        the result of the method call.

      • getAllFields

        public static List getAllFields(Object obj,
                boolean excludeStatic,
                boolean excludeTransient)
        Retrieves all the fields contained in the given object and its superclasses.
        Parameters:
        obj - the object to examine
        excludeStatic - if true, static fields will be omitted
        excludeTransient - if true, transient fields will be omitted
        Returns:
        a list of fields for the given object

      • setProperty

        public static void setProperty(Object object,
               String property,
               Class propertyType,
               Object value)
        This method sets a property on an object via reflection.
        Parameters:
        object - The object on which the property is to be set.
        property - The name of the property to be set.
        propertyType - The type of the property being set.
        value - The value of the property being set.

      • getProperty

        public static Object getProperty(Object object,
                 String property)
        This method gets a property from an object via reflection.
        Parameters:
        object - The object from which the property is to be retrieved.
        property - The name of the property to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The value of the specified property.
